History

++++++++++++++++++

* First release on PyPI.
* Initial models and REST API

++++++++++++++++++

* Improved REST API filters

++++++++++++++++++

`Full Changelog <https://github.com/chopdgd/django-data-sources-tracking/compare/v0.2.0...v0.2.1)>`_

++++++++++++++++++
